prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with a smooth blue shell and furry ears.
I want to see a Pokemon that evolves from a small turtle to a larger creature.
Generate an aquatic Pokemon with a playful personality and unique tail features.
Make a Pokemon based on a turtle that has a mix of blue and white colors.
Imagine a Pokemon with a water-based combat style and a friendly demeanor.
Design a Pokemon that lives in wetlands and is known for its agility.
Give me a blue Pokemon that has distinct fluffy ears and a strong shell.
